Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Mike B
Reviews.Content: DVD did not work right out of box Christmas morning.  Saw a couple of the same comments before purchasing (on this site and other sites) but took the chance.  Oh well...Stay away!

Reviews.Title: Not such a deal
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Brand new out of the box and the DVD player doesn't work, couldn't get exchange because out of stock, only option given was refund, but I really wanted tv. When on RCAs website for repair, gave all information on contact email, when I tried to submit form, it kept showing me that my email address was required- THE ONE THAT WAS CLEARLY IN THE BOX! Tried retyping and even other email addresses I have, it finally just kicked me out all together. While I'm fighting that, my wife is reading bad reviews on this tv. I give up, sending back to amazon to get my money back. Nice looking tv back don't waste your money

Reviews.Title: R C A T V/DVD Player.
Reviews.Author: Anneliese Foreman
Reviews.Content: I cant get the DVD to work! The T V is fine.I had send the first one back,because the same Problem.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't take it for free.
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: (No stars given if I had the choice.) The DVD player didn't work at all. Went through the tech support suggestions and nothing worked. Many reviews on other sites said this was a common problem. Looks like it's a common problem with the combo sets in general. If I add up the time I took away from work to receive the item at home (which UPS screwed up anyway by a whole 24hrs.), and all the time problem solving I could have purchase a much more expensive rig from the start. Tomorrow I'm going to go out and buy a dvd player and tv that are separate from each other because I'm running out of time and this was supposed to be a surprise gift for my wife's sewing room.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful just a Wonderful TV.
Reviews.Author: sleepersteve
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV and I was worring about how it would work. Yes I read the reviews and even the ones that said the DVD player did not work at all  right from the start, well I READ THE INSTRUCTIONS, just for the heck of it and guess what? You have to put the DVD in like backwards, lable on DVD pointing away from you, or shiny side toward you. And guess what it worked perfectly the very first time and also a great picture to both for the DVD and TV. Yes this little TV is a great buy I knew I could trust RCA. I also used the mount made buy Ready-set-mount model # cc-R22B it works very well and was easy to instal. the TV has all the settings that a larger TV would for everything from tint to closed caption and a lot of other settings so you can really set this TV up to the way you want it. I instaled it above my computer monitor so I can watch all my oldie DVD's and TV. the remote has every button on it also that the large TV's do. Yes I think RCA went all out on making this little but big TV. The color is great and it 's very easy to set all the ajustments. I am sure glad that I decided To buy RCA and not go with the other more costly ones. One thing do not push in the DVD let the DVD player take it in slowly and you will have no problems. This TV is great for the kitchen, den, office, or small bedroom and the sound is not all that bad either. I guess I've said all I can about this little GEM!! Enjoy your TV/DVD player I am enjoying mine. I have had this TV now for a couple of months and it works just great the DVD is also working with out any problems at all I have to say this is a great TV and very inexpensive I use it in my office and it is on all day every day like I said make sure you put the DVD in BACKWARDS or it will not work remember BACKWARDS!!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: D. Washington "D.wash"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for future mother in laws kitchen,i checked reviews,the only thing i kept seeing was dvd player not working,I needed a good tv and this was great for me ,with the dvd player it was still 50.00 cheaper than retail stores that had no dvd player,it has a very good picture, still have not tried dvd .

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV for small spaces.
Reviews.Author: Gena
Reviews.Content: Picture is good, and it fits in small spaces.  The sound on it is my only reason for such a low rating.  It sounds like its in a tin can.  But... you get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy it!
Reviews.Author: Lindy Wyar
Reviews.Content: I bought this prodcut ONLY for the DVD player!And, decided to watch a movie about 4 weeks after receiving it... only to find out that THE DVD PLAYER DIDNT WORK!I decided to go online and read the reviews... which pretty much all read that this is a very common problem.THAT BEING SAID. I called the manufacturers... and they were pretty understanding and gave me no problem to have it covered under warranty. But, I know how refurbished items go- you have them for 3 months (if your lucky) and they break again.So... save yourself... dont buy it.

Reviews.Title: awesome t.v. just love it.
Reviews.Author: frank gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Great product and you cant beat it for the price. Nice picture and convenience of built-in dvd works great. Its a great t.v. for the office.

Reviews.Title: DVD will not load
Reviews.Author: Tyrone Shoelaces
Reviews.Content: This seems to be a common issue with this TV.  Right out of the box I was not able to load a disc.  The only reason I don't return it is the price was about what I would have paid for a TV without the DVD.  My bet is they price it this low knowing the DVD is not going to work, but see how many they can get rid of.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Robert Susi
Reviews.Content: Best I could find for the price. Works perfectly in the kitchen.Arrived before estimated date. Very happy!I would highly recommend this product for a small room.

Reviews.Title: pay attention to other reviews
Reviews.Author: turnat "turnat"
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this TV.  The picture is great if you're sitting directly in front of it.  Move 2 inches either way and you're watching ghost heads floating on a dark screen. Never seen anything like it.  Called support they told me I had the wrong connection cabel, got  a HDMI cable, absolutly no difference.  Save your money.  this is no bargain

Reviews.Title: Not fully functional
Reviews.Author: Henry Dennard
Reviews.Content: Before I bought this I saw other reviews that advised that the integrated DVD player didn't work but I went ahead and bought it anyway. Well, guess what? The DVD player doesn't work. Not a really big deal for me though because I didn't base my purchase on the built-in DVD player. Other than that it is a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: dvd player did not operate  at all
Reviews.Author: tom daley
Reviews.Content: tv looked fine  no dvd  player operation at all , do not waste your time  sent back after talking with customer service . looks to be  a common problem with this model.

Reviews.Title: Loved tv.... however  DVD player didn't work
Reviews.Author: Linda Ritchie
Reviews.Content: Super cheap, so its worth the money. However I should have read the reviews! I don't think any of the dvd players work!

Reviews.Title: A real nice small TV
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: Nice product, a really good picture for the price. With the DVD player builted in, its less wires to worry about hooking out.

Reviews.Title: Defective product (had two delivered)
Reviews.Author: mrsrivers
Reviews.Content: The TV worked great, but the DVD players was defective on BOTH TVs!!  We thought the first DVD defect was a fluke and Amazon glady offered to send a replacement.  They did so, quickly.  When we received the second one, the DVD player wouldn't work on it either.  Amazon was gracious and handled everything beautifully.  It was a shame not to be able to get a working product.

Reviews.Title: great tv just no dvd
Reviews.Author: cokeman
Reviews.Content: got the tv today out of the box the dvd wouldnt work but thats ok the tv works great and for 74 some odd dollars cant complain too much

Reviews.Title: RCA 19LB30RQD 19-Inch LCD 720p 60Hz TV (Black)
Reviews.Author: olsaltyj
Reviews.Content: Upon receipt of the RCA 19LB30RQD 19-Inch LCD 720p a few days ago, I was enthusiastic and excited to set up the little TV; however, I was slightly disappointed that the DVD player did not work. As far back as I can remember as a child in the 60's, RCA products have been in our families' homes and we have always been quite pleased with the quality and performance that is synonymous with RCA. Perhaps this is a minor manufacturing technical issue that needs to be addressed and remedied as soon as possible. On the other hand, the picture quality is spot on, in spite of the DVD dilemma. At this point, I am debating on whether I should take a chance and trade this unit in for another unit, keep it the way that it is because of the relatively affordable price, or simply request a refund; I haven't made up my mind yet. Nevertheless, I will give the TV 3 stars for the impressive picture quality.

Reviews.Title: DVD Player Does Not Work
Reviews.Author: M. Wright "Matt"
Reviews.Content: It looks like Amazon has recognized the problem with the DVD player.  I knew about this problem when I ordered the TV.  I ordered anyway because it was a great price for just the TV and I am happy with the purchase.  If they offer an exchange at some point, I would not mind having a working DVD player.The picture and sound are quite good, particularly for the money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, Don't Buy It For the DVD Player
Reviews.Author: Bixby "Bixby"
Reviews.Content: I am giving this 5 stars for the great quality tv it is, beautiful picture, easy set up AND I got it for 77 bucks on Amazon new!That said I figured the dvd player would not work after reading the comments but since it was for a work room of mine and I knew I would not use the dvd player I jumped at that price and got a nice little tv.FYI we stuck a dvd we really didn't care about in the player to see if it did work and nope, ate the dvd and it would have to be pulled out, I'm just going to leave it. I expected that and was not upset.Go with another item if you want a working dvd player, if you just want a great little tv then get it at the right price.

Reviews.Title: DVD Player Did not work, right out of the box!
Reviews.Author: Mr.Qman
Reviews.Content: I am very disapointed that the DVD player did not work, especially since it was brand new.Horrible! Don't buy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Bad DVD
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Got this on Amazon after reading bad reviews. For $84.44 it is a great TV. As in other reviews the DVD didn't work! Buy this for the TV and not the DVD. You can't find a 19 inch tv of this quality for $84.44 I'm giving the tv portion 5 stars only because I don't care about the DVD.

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: leah
Reviews.Content: Seen this tv. By looks, thought it was ok. Seemed like a deal. Umm NOOOO... BIGGEST POS WASTE OF $$$ EVER. Just got it yesterday and the effin thing is already broke.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: T. V.
Reviews.Content: I replaced the old tv in the bedroom with this one and it has a beautiful picture. I am pleased with it, and the price was fantastic.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: WCC
Reviews.Content: They are having an issue with the DVD player in this TV.  Will they take it back?  NO, we have to pick out a $30 DVD player to compensate for their problem. So the whole idea of a compact tv/dvd is shot if you have to attach another dvd player.  What kind of service is that?  We notified them in under 30 days also.

Reviews.Title: DVD - Silver Side facing front
Reviews.Author: Collierville Family
Reviews.Content: TV and DVD work well.  The DVD should be inserted with the silver side facing forward, which is a little counter-intuitive.  However, there is a sticker on the front of the TV explaining this fact.  When followed, the DVD works well.

ProductInfo.Features:
1 HDMI Connection, with Remote control
Resolution: 1366 x 768
Contrast Ratio: 1000:1
Tuner Mode: ATSC/NTSC
USB Media Play: Photos, Music
ProductInfo.Name: RCA 19LB30RQD 19-Inch LCD 720p 60Hz TV (Black)
